name: A Random Maze
description:
Description:

A Ramdom Maze is an independent RPG game made by RPG Maker. Its Demo has been published (can be downloaded below) and the normal version will be out in December, 2018.

It tells a story of the amnesiac main character and his mysterious friend. It contains slight horror, violence and LGBT elements.

Credits:

Made by Utopia Museum Studio

Design/Art: Ebonbio

Programming:Lotus Li 

Music/Sound: Karane
